Motion Sensing Service

NOTICE:

The namespace prefix http://cisco.com/jnap/ has been deprecated but is still supported. All JNAP clients should switch to the new namespace prefix http://linksys.com/jnap/.

Change History

Revision Date Notes
1.0.3 2021-06-01 Added the following:
  • action GetMotionSensingCapableSlaves2 in service MotionSensing2
  • struct MotionCapableNodeInfo
1.0.2 2020-10-28 Added service MotionSensing2, including the following:
  • action StartMotionSensingBotScanning
  • action GetBotScanningStatus
  • action GetAvailableMotionSensingBots
  • action GetActiveMotionSensingBots
  • action AddMotionSensingBots
  • action RemoveMotionSensingBots
1.0.1 2019-08-26 Added GetMotionSensingCapableSlaves.
1.0.0 2019-07-30 Initial Release.

Services

MotionSensing

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/MotionSensing
This service provides access to the motion sensing feature on the router.

Service Actions

  • GetMotionSensingCapableSlaves
  • GetMotionSensingSettings
  • SetMotionSensingSettings

MotionSensing2

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/MotionSensing2
This service provides access to the motion sensing feature on the router.

Service Actions

  • AddMotionSensingBots
  • GetActiveMotionSensingBots
  • GetAvailableMotionSensingBots
  • GetBotScanningStatus
  • GetMotionSensingCapableSlaves2
  • GetMotionSensingSettings
  • RemoveMotionSensingBots
  • SetMotionSensingSettings
  • StartMotionSensingBotScanning

Actions

AddMotionSensingBots

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/AddMotionSensingBots
This action adds devices as active motion sensing bots on the network.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
deviceIDs UUID[] no List of devices to add as active motion sensing bots.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
errorDeviceID UUID yes The UUID of a device that could not be added as a motion sensing bot, due to an error. This parameter will be present only when an error result is returned.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/AddMotionSensingBotsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorUnknownDevice The device could not be found in the database.
ErrorWirelessMACAddressNotFound The device's wireless MAC address could not be found in the database. This sometimes occurs when a device is off-line.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorDisallowedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/AddMotionSensingBots"

{
  "deviceIDs": [
    "c23de4d6-15d0-40bf-8f43-5d354b222992"
  ]
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "errorDeviceID": "c23de4d6-15d0-40bf-8f43-5d354b222992"
  }
}

GetActiveMotionSensingBots

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/GetActiveMotionSensingBots
This action gets a list of active motion sensing bots on the network.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
deviceIDs UUID[] no List of active motion sensing bot devices.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/GetActiveMotionSensingBotsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/GetActiveMotionSensingBots"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "deviceIDs": [
      "c23de4d6-15d0-40bf-8f43-5d354b222992"
    ]
  }
}

GetAvailableMotionSensingBots

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/GetAvailableMotionSensingBots
This action can be called to get the results of the bot scanning process initiated by StartMotionSensingBotScanning. It returns a list of available motion sensing bot devices on the network.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
deviceIDs UUID[] no List of available motion sensing bot devices.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/GetAvailableMotionSensingBotsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/GetAvailableMotionSensingBots"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "deviceIDs": [
      "c23de4d6-15d0-40bf-8f43-5d354b222992"
    ]
  }
}

GetBotScanningStatus

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/GetBotScanningStatus
This action gets the status of the bot scanning process initiated by StartMotionSensingBotScanning.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
remainingScanTime int no The estimated time, in seconds, until completion of the bot scanning process. This value will be 0 if the scanning process is idle.
status BotScanningStatus yes The status of the bot scanning process. This parameter will be absent if the bot scanning process has not been run since bootup.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/GetBotScanningStatusResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/GetBotScanningStatus"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "remainingScanTime": 123,
    "status": "Starting"
  }
}

GetMotionSensingCapableSlaves

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/GetMotionSensingCapableSlaves
This action gets the slaves with Motion Sensing FW.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
deviceIDs UUID[] no List of Slaves with Motion Sensing FW.

Result

Error

_ErrorInvalidInput

_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

GetMotionSensingCapableSlaves2

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/GetMotionSensingCapableSlaves2
This action gets the slaves with Motion Sensing FW.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
motionCapableSlaves MotionCapableNodeInfo[] no List of Slaves with Motion Sensing FW.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/GetMotionSensingCapableSlaves2Result
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/GetMotionSensingCapableSlaves2"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "motionCapableSlaves": [
      {
        "deviceID": "c23de4d6-15d0-40bf-8f43-5d354b222992",
        "supportedPhase": 123
      }
    ]
  }
}

GetMotionSensingSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/GetMotionSensingSettings
This action gets the motion sensing settings.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
isMotionSensingEnabled bool no Whether the motion sensing is enabled.
configurationFile string yes The motion sensing configuration file.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/GetMotionSensingSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/GetMotionSensingSettings"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "isMotionSensingEnabled": true,
    "configurationFile": "example string"
  }
}

RemoveMotionSensingBots

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/RemoveMotionSensingBots
This action removes devices as active motion sensing bots on the network.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
deviceIDs UUID[] no List of devices to remove as active motion sensing bots.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
errorDeviceID UUID yes The UUID of a device that could not be removed as a motion sensing bot, due to an error. This parameter will be present only when an error result is returned.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/RemoveMotionSensingBotsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorUnknownDevice The device could not be found in the database.
ErrorWirelessMACAddressNotFound The device's wireless MAC address could not be found in the database. This sometimes occurs when a device is off-line.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorDisallowedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/RemoveMotionSensingBots"

{
  "deviceIDs": [
    "c23de4d6-15d0-40bf-8f43-5d354b222992"
  ]
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "errorDeviceID": "c23de4d6-15d0-40bf-8f43-5d354b222992"
  }
}

SetMotionSensingSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/SetMotionSensingSettings
This action sets the motion sensing settings.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
isMotionSensingEnabled bool no Whether the motion sensing should be enabled.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/SetMotionSensingSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/SetMotionSensingSettings"

{
  "isMotionSensingEnabled": true
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

StartMotionSensingBotScanning

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/StartMotionSensingBotScanning
This action starts the process of scanning for motion sensing bot devices on the network.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/StartMotionSensingBotScanningResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorBotScanningInProcess The scanning process is already running.
ErrorNoDevicesOnline There are no on-line wireless devices to scan.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorDisallowedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/StartMotionSensingBotScanning"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

Structures

MotionCapableNodeInfo

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/MotionCapableNodeInfo
Structure containing information about a motion-capable Node.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
deviceID UUID no The device ID of the motion capable Node.
supportedPhase int no The supported phase of motion sensing functionality in firmware.

Enumerations

BotScanningStatus

http://linksys.com/jnap/motionsensing/BotScanningStatus
This service provides access to the motion sensing feature on the router. Values representing the status of the bot scanning process.

Enumeration Values

Value Description
Starting The bot scanning process is starting.
Running The bot scanning process is running.
Success The last bot scanning process completed successfully.
Error The last bot scanning process terminated with an error.
